item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, we will be having another massage night! The others have been so successful everyone has been asking me when the next one will be. Munib (user name Wanag) is opening up his house for our get together!

I will be happy to teach anyone who is not familiar with the art. If there are other professionals who would be willing to teach others the art of massage I welcome them. We will be having a group massage as well as a group hug. There is no cost for the massage.

Please bring a chair, loose comfortable clothing, and some good food to share (potluck). Also bring a massage table if you have one and any soothing oils that you like. If you have any questions don't hesitate to contact me at: 603-509-2907 or if you need further directions you can call Munib at 781-718-6970.

This is a combined event with the Social Fun meetup group.

Look forward to seeing everyone there for an interesting night of massage and interesting discussions!

Will send the directions to those who RSVP Yes as we get closer to the night of the event.

Thanks,
Peter




If your first name begins with the following letter, here are some suggestions for the pot luck portion:

  • A-E = soup or salad (with dressing/s)
  • F-I = an entree
  • M = bring plates, utensils, or napkins, and trash bags
  • N-R = bread or dessert
  • S-Z = beverages

Please bring something nutritious and have something to serve it with (ladle, spoon, or fork) and be prepared to bring home your leftovers after the event.

Would also love it if we can get a few hands after the event to stay and help clean up. There is a large group attending this function, and we want to be as welcoming a Guest as possible! Munib has a beautiful home, I would hope to make sure we leave it as wonderful as when we arrive.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Massage Night
